{{letter_head or ''}}

Appointment letter

{% set full_name = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "employee_name") %} {% set address = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "current_address") %}

To,
{{full_name or ""}}
{{address or ""}}

Dear {{full_name or ""}}


{% set address = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "current_address") %}

We are pleased to extend this offer of employment to you for the position of {% set designation = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "designation") %} {{designation or ""}} at Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd. We believe your leadership, experience, and vision will be instrumental in driving our company toward new heights of success.


1. Position and Reporting:


You will hold the position of {{designation or ""}} , and you will report directly to the Board of Directors. Your role will involve overseeing the overall operations of the company, ensuring strategic growth, and leading the organization in achieving its objectives.


2. Date of Joining:


Your joining date is {% set date = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "date_of_joining") %} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}


3. Compensation and Benefits:


  • Performance Bonus: You will be eligible for an annual performance bonus based on the company’s performance and your achievement of key objectives, which will be evaluated by the Board of Directors.
  • Provident Fund: The contribution towards Provident Fund will be as per statutory guidelines.
  • Medical Insurance: You and your immediate family members will be covered under the company's comprehensive medical insurance plan.
  • Gratuity:Gratuity will be payable as per the Payment of Gratuity Act, 1972.
  • CTC : The ctc breakup will be detailed in annexure-1

4. Working Hours:


  • As the CEO, your role will require flexibility in working hours, given the strategic nature of the position. You are expected to ensure the smooth functioning of all operations and maintain effective communication with the Board of Directors.

5. Leave Policy:


  • You will be entitled to leave as per the company’s leave policy. Any additional leave or travel allowances will be discussed and approved on a case-by-case basis.

6. Confidentiality and non-disclosure:


  • You are expected to maintain the highest level of confidentiality regarding all company matters. Any sensitive information, intellectual property, or trade secrets should not be disclosed during or after your employment with Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd.

7. Termination and Notice Period:


  • Either party may terminate this appointment by providing [Insert Number] months' notice in writing or salary in lieu of the notice period. However, any act of gross misconduct or breach of contract could lead to immediate termination.

8. Acceptance:


  • Please sign and return a copy of this letter as a token of your acceptance of the terms and conditions mentioned herein.
  • We are excited to welcome you as the CEO of Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd., and we look forward to a prosperous journey together.



Yours sincerely,





Authorized Signature
For Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd.



Acceptance:


I Swati, accept the above terms and conditions of my appointment as CEO of Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd.
